snippet: Jesse Curtis Morton went by the name Younus Abdullah Mohammad when he and another man, Zachary A. Chesser, wrote on a radical Muslim Web site that an episode of "South Park" had insulted the Prophet Muhammad.
abstract: Jesse Curtis Morton went by the name Younus Abdullah Mohammad when he and another man, Zachary A. Chesser, wrote on a radical Muslim Web site that an episode of "South Park" had insulted the Prophet Muhammad.

headline.main: Man Pleads Guilty to Making Online Threats Against 'South Park' Creators
